Uses of Package
crazyballrun.game.controls

  • Packages that use crazyballrun.game.controls 
    Package Description
    crazyballrun.game  
    crazyballrun.game.controls  
    crazyballrun.game.controls.icontrols  
    crazyballrun.game.gui.controls  
  • Classes in crazyballrun.game.controls used by crazyballrun.game 
    Class and Description
    EventContent
    The EventContent class contains all necessary information concerning a control event (e.g. x- and y-value for mouse click coordinates).
    EventMapper
    The EventMapper maps events to actions (like "arrow key pressed" -> "rotate player").
    IControl
    The IControl is an interface for game controllers like the mouse and keyboard.
  • Classes in crazyballrun.game.controls used by crazyballrun.game.controls 
    Class and Description
    ControlEngine
    The ControlEngine is initialized by the game, which fills the EventMapper with data according to the game configuration file and gives a list of IControl-instances to the engine.
    EventContent
    The EventContent class contains all necessary information concerning a control event (e.g. x- and y-value for mouse click coordinates).
    EventMapper
    The EventMapper maps events to actions (like "arrow key pressed" -> "rotate player").
    IControl
    The IControl is an interface for game controllers like the mouse and keyboard.
    IListener
    The IListener provides an interface for event-listeners of IControls.
  • Classes in crazyballrun.game.controls used by crazyballrun.game.controls.icontrols 
    Class and Description
    IControl
    The IControl is an interface for game controllers like the mouse and keyboard.
    IListener
    The IListener provides an interface for event-listeners of IControls.
  • Classes in crazyballrun.game.controls used by crazyballrun.game.gui.controls 
    Class and Description
    IListener
    The IListener provides an interface for event-listeners of IControls.
